eecalcs.conduits

Class Conduit

  • java.lang.Object
    • eecalcs.conduits.Conduit

  • public class Conduit
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates constants, static data and methods about electrical conduits as found in NEC 2014 table 4

    • Method Detail

      • getConduitMaterialPerIndex

        public static Material getConduitMaterialPerIndex(int conduitTypeIndex)
        Returns the conduit material corresponding to the given index
        Parameters:
        conduitTypeIndex - The index of the conduit material. 0 = PVC, 1 = aluminum and other = steel
        Returns:
        The requested material
        See Also:
        Material

      • getTradeSizes

        public static java.lang.String[] getTradeSizes()
        Returns the list of the registered conduit standard trade sizes
        Returns:
        The list of the registered conduit standard trade sizes

      • getTypes

        public static java.lang.String[] getTypes()
        Returns the list of the registered conduit types
        Returns:
        The list of the registered conduit types

      • isValidType

        public static boolean isValidType(java.lang.String conduitType)
        Asks if the given conduit type is valid, that is, it's registered in the conduit type list
        Parameters:
        conduitType - The requested conduit type
        Returns:
        True if it's a valid conduit type, false otherwise

      • hasArea

        public static boolean hasArea(java.lang.String conduitType,
                              java.lang.String tradeSize)
        Asks if the given conduit type and trade size has an internal area, that is the type and size are valid (NEC 2014 Table 4)
        Parameters:
        conduitType - The type of conduit
        tradeSize - The size of the conduit
        Returns:
        True if the requested conduit type and size has an internal area.

      • getArea

        public static double getArea(java.lang.String conduitType,
                             java.lang.String tradeSize)
        Gets the area of the given conduit type and trade size
        Parameters:
        conduitType - The type of conduit
        tradeSize - The size of the conduit
        Returns:
        The area in square inches of the conduit or zero if not in NEC 2014 table 4
